article:
It's Sunday night, time for me to write the composition I tried to write this afternoon.This afternoon I sat at my desk for hours and wrote nothing.Well, that's not true.I started to write something down several times, but each time I stopped,   stared at   the sentence for a couple of minutes and then either crossed it out or crumpled  up the paper.This composition is   _   tomorrow, but at this   _   it will never be finisheD.Why is it such a   _   to write a composition?
I have trouble in writing a composition every weekenD.I   keep   putting off doing homework until Sunday afternoon.Then when I finally sit down to begin, I don't begin.I   _   up to sharpen my pencils.Then I   _   up to get more paper and to get a   _   of water.By this time I am so   _   that I have to get up again to go to the bathroom.When I finally get   _  , I find that I still can't begin.Whenever I get an idea and try to write it down, I don't like the way the words   come out   on paper, so I just sit there, trying to find the   _   sentence to begin my composition.After several hours of getting nowhere, I go and get some   _  .Then I drag myself back to the desk.I hurriedly write something down to   _   the teacher's demands for a composition when I'm just about to go to sleep.It is always a lot   _   than the teacher wants and I always think it is so bad that I never read it over before handing it in.
I can't delay any longer.It's going to be a long night again.
